duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain professional relationships with internal company team members, especially with Enterprise Sales Executives (ESE)
Work closely with the ESEs in the organization to grow overall company revenue
Perform outbound calling, qualifying and converting leads into appointments for ESE
Follow up with qualified leads until they’re active and ready for ESE ownership
Prepare targeted emails and promotion materials for prospects
Articulate company value proposition to prospects
Execute on established Territory Marketing Plan
Target net-new companies and uncover new opportunities using other channels

Achieve Monthly KPI’s based on: Minimum # of calls/touchpoints per day, Quality appointments for ESE per week, Follow up touch points with qualified leads, Qualified lead conversion into active leads, Recording all activities in company CRM
Nurture a positive team environment, in alignment with PROLIM Core Values

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience preferred
